NAME: Ab Irato
ISSUE SUMMARY: In a dystopian future of mounting sea levels, the rich have access to a rejuvenating vaccine that can allow lifespans of hundreds of years. A young man named Riel arrives in the urban metropolis of Montreal and meets a young woman, Neve, who is allied with rebel insurgents (the "Bastards of God") fighting the corporate powers that control the city and the vaccine.

NAME: Ab Irato
ISSUE SUMMARY: Riel follows Neve into the rebel ranks just as the security forces of the city begin their murderous search for the mysterious Gana.

NAME: Ab Irato
ISSUE SUMMARY: Gana raids the headquarters of Juvex Corp even as the Bastards of God, under mounting pressure from the police, fall into infighting and take hostages

NAME: Ab Irato
ISSUE SUMMARY: Riel learns to his horror that the police have decided to solve the hostage standoff with extreme prejudice: no traces, no witnesses, no rebels, no hostages . . . and Gana finds that mercenaries hired by Juvex Corp are closing in on her.

NAME: Ab Irato
ISSUE SUMMARY: The radical new leader of the Bastards of God threatens to execute a hostage every hour if his demands are not met, N√®ve tries to escape from her captors, and Riel searches desperately for a solution.

NAME: Ab Irato
ISSUE SUMMARY: In the finale to Ab Irato, Riel tries to save N√®ve even as Gana‚Äôs final confrontation with the CEO of Juvex comes to its bloody conclusion, and a city pushed to the brink by rage and anger threatens to implode.

NAME: Accell
ISSUE SUMMARY: Daniel DosSantos is a young man living at the speed of life. After gaining powers from exposure to an extraterrestrial object, DosSantos became the rapid action superhero called Accell, the first of a new public kind of self-appointed crime fighter. Unfortunately, there are consequences to moving faster than sound. Accell is about to learn that danger exists on the flipside of having superpowers and will have to grow up quickly to survive.
COVER ARTIST(S):
Robert Campanella
Damion Scott
Sigmund Torre

NAME: Accell
ISSUE SUMMARY: Accell can run faster than fast, but he’s not faster than the speed demon hot on his tail. With the help of a mysterious elder, the world’s first superhero fights for his life. This is the night that will change Accell’s life forever, and everyone doesn’t make it out alive.

NAME: Accell
ISSUE SUMMARY: L.A.’s newest super-fast superhero Accell returns home after a life-changing metaphysical experience, just in time to help a friend battle some personal demons. nToo bad Accell has no idea new enemies are gathering to make his life a living hell, especially the crime lord known as Glazz.

NAME: Accell
ISSUE SUMMARY: Daniel DosSantos is the speedster superhero Accell, but his recent adventures have him shaken to the core, so what’s the solution? Go clubbing with the girlfriend!Too bad the supervillain Midnight Blue likes the clubs, too, and she doesn’t have patience for any superheroes who choose to step in her direction.

NAME: Accell
ISSUE SUMMARY: After taking a serious beating from the dangerous diva called Midnight Blue, Accell gets a visit from an old friend, and a new ally begins to help him learn the full extent of speed powers.Meanwhile, a power struggle for the crime business in Accell’s town is happening, and his girlfriend’s father is the mastermind of it all.

NAME: Accell
ISSUE SUMMARY: After taking a beating from the mercenary Midnight Blue, Accell's life as a super speedster is fractured between science and mysticism. An old friend returns from the spirit realm to guide Accell on the right path, while scientist Althea Morrison works with the hero to figure out just how fast he can go. The world's first public superhero is about to have his perceptions of life torn apart at breakneck speed.

NAME: Accell
ISSUE SUMMARY: After meeting with Althea, a brilliant scientist who recruits Daniel to test the limits of his speedster powers, Daniel finds himself a long way from the warm waters of his home and greeted by the polar ice caps of Antarctica. Meanwhile, back home, George Hayes has begun building his own business network of mercenaries. The more Daniel learns about being Accell, the more the reality around him begins to shift.

NAME: Accell
ISSUE SUMMARY: Having survived a close call in Antarctica with the deadly FUZZ, Daniel finds himself back in his hometown reunited with his longtime girlfriend Monica.   While Daniel tries to figure out more about his powers and how they're affecting the space of reality around him, Monica finds out something sinister about her father's business dealings. This is the final issue of Volume 2 of Accell!

NAME: Accell
ISSUE SUMMARY: Daniel Dos Santos has been through a lot since he got his powers from a meteor rock that he found after "The Event": fighting against a barrage of colorful villains, learning the limits of his powers, and trying to hold together his relationship with his girlfriend, Monica Hayes. Life hasn't been easy for Daniel, and right now, he just wants to be normal and maybe make some money. Being a superhero doesn't pay the bills after all.  But what is "normal" when you have the power to speed through layers of space and time? Find out in the next arc of Accell!

NAME: Accell
ISSUE SUMMARY: In trying to give up being a superhero and live a normal life, Daniel's problems have only seemed to grow instead of shrink. His relationship with Monica has finally reached a breaking point, and there's a brand-new, gun-shooting villain on the streets. Encouraged by Althea, can Daniel jump back into the race, or will he quit before the first shot is fired?

NAME: Accell
ISSUE SUMMARY: Daniel's battle with the newest villain on the block isn't letting up, and he narrowly escapes with more injuries than he means to. Luckily his friend, scientist Althea Morrison, is there to help him when the going continues getting rougher for the would-be superhero. Besides getting into trouble with gun-wielding bad guys, Daniel is also seeing more of the mysterious ghost of Jesse Tonawanda. Even worse, an old enemy is back in town and she's working with Glazz. Daniel's life is about to get even more complicated.

NAME: Accell
ISSUE SUMMARY: Daniel's recovery from his run-in with the mysterious Gun Reaver has left him shaken up and a little lost. Althea Morrison, his companion and support, encourages his continued exploration into becoming a full-fledged superhero. But is that what Daniel really wants? Worse still, all his enemies have begun to make their move toward taking him out, even including an old flame back from the ashes.

NAME: Accell
ISSUE SUMMARY: Back on the track of being a superhero, Daniel finds himself struggling against a new cranked up villain charging down his streets. On the outskirts of the chaos, Monica and George Hayes make their own moves toward criminal domination. Althea Morrison investigates the root of disruptions in Daniel's powers and discovers a shocking secret.

NAME: Accell
ISSUE SUMMARY: Daniel Dos Santos is getting used to his life changing almost as fast as he can run, but what's happening now might be a bit much, even for him. After his devoted girlfriend Monica decides she's had too much of getting too little of Daniel's attention, her hell-bent father unleashes a trio of monstrous supervillains on him. Maybe that wouldn't be so bad if Daniel wasn't also grappling with a newly discovered side effect of his powers—the insane revelation that his body has begun to physically merge with the Stream when he uses them. And now that this bizarre metamorphosis has started, he might not be able to stop it.

NAME: Accell
ISSUE SUMMARY: Daniel Dos Santos has been facing a lot of big problems lately, including losing both his job and his girlfriend. But his problems are growing bigger by the minute—literally—now that the bizarre, sound-based creature known as "The Fuzz" has escaped its former hiding place and is mysteriously morphing to gigantic proportions. Can Daniel find a way to take down the sonic behemoth before it takes out the entire city? More importantly, can he do it without compromising his own safety, now that he knows that his physical form is being altered by The Stream? As if that wasn't enough to keep Daniel running for his life, George Hayes has renewed his vows to kill his daughter's ex with his trio of villainous superbrutes. Run, Daniel, run!

NAME: Accell
ISSUE SUMMARY: Daniel may have been able to defeat The Fuzz for the second time, but that doesn't mean things are going anywhere near back to normal. With his biological connection to the Stream taking over his body more every day, Daniel's life—and his perspective on it—is changing fast. Meanwhile, Monica has discovered her father's plans to kill Daniel and will do anything to keep him safe. But if she can't save Daniel from the villainous trio, and Althea can't save him from the Stream, can Daniel save himself? Maybe if Accell can embrace his situation, he can find his own way out the other side.

NAME: Accell
ISSUE SUMMARY: Barrage, Maceface, and Kobe make their first move against Accell. But as Daniel’s condition escalates, will his connection to the Stream help him or the trio of villains? Meanwhile, George Hayes monitors his villains-for-hire, unaware that he is being watched as well.

NAME: Age of X-Man
ISSUE SUMMARY: The X-Tremists keep the peace in the Age of X-Man! A perfect world doesn’t just…happen. It needs to be cultivated. That’s where the X-Tremists come in. Psylocke, Iceman, Northstar, Blob, Jubilee and Moneta protect people from threats they won’t ever even know existed, including the most insidious threat of all: love! But even as Department X continues its work of purging and revising the ill-fitting elements of society, an encounter with a pregnant rebel begins eating away at the team from within! Worse still, can two members of the squad resist falling prey to the very thing they’re fighting to prevent? Some X-Tremists want to know love. Some X-Tremists want to know freedom. But some X-Tremists just want to watch the world burn.

NAME: Algeria Is Beautiful
ISSUE SUMMARY: Olivia had always heard stories about Algeria from her maternal grandmother, a Black Foot (a "Pied-Noir," the French term for Christian and Jewish settlers of French Algeria who emigrated to France after the Algerian War of Independence). After her grandmother's death, Olivia found some of her grandmother's journals and letters describing her homeland. Now, ten years later, she resolves to travel to Algeria and experience the country for herself; she arrives alone, with her grandmother's postcards and letters in tow, and a single phone number in her pocket of an Algerian, Djaffar, who will act as her guide. Olivia's quest to understand her origins will bring her to face questions about heritage, history, shame, friendship, memory, nostalgia, fantasy, the nature of exile, and our unending quest to understand who we are and where we come from.

NAME: Astonisher
ISSUE SUMMARY: Magnus Atitarn, heir to the Atitarn Satellite Corp., tried to save the world with his experimental one-man spaceship and ended up a broken man. Now a celebrity joke suffering from post-traumatic stress disorder, Magnus has the power to travel inside the minds of superpowered people, where he discovers nightmares which threaten the entire human race. nThe strangest corners of the Catalyst Prime Universe are explored in this new series!

NAME: Astonisher
ISSUE SUMMARY: To save his crumbling reputation, entrepreneur Magnus Attarian has jumpstarted his celebrity status and become the Astonisher, the superhero with a meteor-powered battle suit. Unfortunately, traveling inside the minds of superpowered enemies means fighting their nightmares, and Magnus encounters a mysterious psychic presence. One that plans to kill him and destroy everything and everyone he holds dear.

NAME: Astonisher
ISSUE SUMMARY: Magnus and Drew's sibling rivalry has been a long-standing, damaging tradition between them. Now, as Magnus tests the limits of his new Astonisher technology and the depths of the astral plane, his own personal desires place his brother in even greater peril. Will his sibling's endgame be a tragic footnote in Magnus's life or mark a new beginning for them both?

NAME: Astonisher
ISSUE SUMMARY: Magnus Attarian is still on a singular mission to save his brother Drew from his fate at the hands of the mysterious alien red parasite, but Magnus continues to face several obstacles that impede his goal. Now facing a new antagonist with similar abilities, Magnus realizes he's not as special as he has always believed. Meanwhile, Branch Seven returns with a startling proposition for Sasha.

NAME: Bitter Root
ISSUE SUMMARY:
In the 1920s, the Harlem Renaissance is in full swing, and only the Sangerye Family can save New York—and the world—from the supernatural forces threatening to destroy humanity. But the once-great family of monster hunters has been torn apart by tragedies and conflicting moral codes. The Sangerye Family must heal the wounds of the past and move beyond their differences… or sit back and watch a force of unimaginable evil ravage the human race.

DAVID F. WALKER and SANFORD GREENE, the creative team of Power Man and Iron Fist, along with indie veteran CHUCK BROWN(Trench Coats, Cigarettes and Shotguns) bring you 24 action-packed pages of monsters, mayhem, and family dysfunction in a brand-new ongoing series.

BITTER ROOT Cover As by SANFORD GREENE will be connecting through the first story arc.
CHARACTERS:
Berg Sangerye
Blink Sangerye
Cullen Sangerye
Etta "Ma" Sangerye
Ford Sangeyre
COVER ARTIST(S):
Sanford Greene
Mike Mignola
Denys Cowan
Brittany Williams
Jarreau Wimberly

NAME: Bitter Root
ISSUE SUMMARY: The Sangerye family has fought evil for decades, but they’ve never faced anything like this. And while two family members have returned home, one may be lost forever as Hell comes to Harlem. BITTER ROOT Cover As by SANFORD GREENE will be connecting through the first story arc.
CHARACTERS:
Berg Sangerye
Blink Sangerye
Cullen Sangerye
Etta "Ma" Sangerye
Ford Sangeyre
COVER ARTIST(S):
Sanford Greene
Jarreau Wimberly
Natacha Bustos
David Mack
Kevin Nowlan
Ben Oliver

NAME: Black Hammer
ISSUE SUMMARY: HEROES NEVER DIE...THEY JUST GET RETCONNED! Once they were heroes, but the age of heroes has long since passed. Banished from existence by a multiversal crisis, the old champions of Spiral City...Abraham Slam, Golden Gail, Colonel Weird, Madame Dragonfly, and Barbalien...now lead simple lives in a timeless farming town. Even as they try to find their way home, trouble has a unique way of finding heroes wherever they are! From the prodigious brain of Jeff Lemire (Animal MAgan, Sweet Tooth)! Amazingly realized by Dean Ormston (Lucifer, 2000 AD) and Dave Stewart (Hellboy)! Extra-long first issue...26 story pages!

NAME: Black Hammer
ISSUE SUMMARY: The Golden Age heroes of Spiral City have been erased from existence! Banished years ago to a timeless farming community, the team are torn between accepting their fate and finding a way home! Chapter two focuses on child hero Golden Gail, whose un-aging body most deeply feels the tragedy of their new lives.

NAME: Black Hammer
ISSUE SUMMARY: Long before Spiral Citys greatest heroes were written out of their universe, the Martian champion Barbalien was already stranded far from home. Disguised as churchgoing Mark Markz in the timeless farming community where the heroes find themselves trapped, Barbalien faces a terrifying personal decision, even as he relives his painful past!

NAME: Black Hammer
ISSUE SUMMARY: In the forties, Abraham Slam faced such menaces as the psychedelic Florist and the eldritch Cthu-Lou without breaking a sweat. But keeping the heroes of Black Hammer Farm from each others throats when his girlfriend comes to dinner proves far more perilous! Meanwhile, the Black Hammer's daughter uncovers new clues to the exiled heroes disappearance!

NAME: Black Hammer
ISSUE SUMMARY: Of the exiled heroes, only Colonel Weird can leave the mysterious farm where they’ve spent the last ten years. But the confusion of the Para-Zone may hamper their escape more than it helps!

NAME: Black Hammer
ISSUE SUMMARY: Madame Dragonfly has been harboring dark secrets for hundreds of years, keeping them locked up in the mysterious Cabin of Horrors. Now that her cabin is trapped on Black Hammer Farm, the only secrets she can collect are the broken hearts of small-town folk. But the arrival of a new visitor to the farm will change everything.

NAME: Black Hammer
ISSUE SUMMARY:
Joe Weber: the Black Hammer. A hero from the Spiral Slums. A husband. A father. Gone without a trace.

A visitor from the outside world arrives on the farm, looking for the Black Hammer and bringing news of Spiral City to its Golden Age heroes. Her arrival stirs up old memories and awakens new hope in the marooned heroes.

NAME: Black Hammer
ISSUE SUMMARY: There’s something unusual about the sleepy farming community of Rockwood: it’s now the home of Spiral City’s mysteriously vanished superheroes. But not by choice: they were banished to the town after a battle with the Anti-God, and now they’re stuck within its boundaries. Lately, a new arrival in town has started asking questions, and she’s discovering that its superpowered residents aren’t the only strange thing about Rockwood . . .

NAME: Black Hammer
ISSUE SUMMARY: In the golden age of space exploration, Colonel Randall Weird was on the frontlines. In his interstellar travels he encountered many strange worlds and alien civilizations, but none more curious than the technological marvel that became his best friend: Talky-Walky! Guest artist David Rubin reveals her robotic backstory in this special issue of Black Hammer!

NAME: Black Hammer
ISSUE SUMMARY: The heroes of Spiral City have hung up their costumes and adapted to life in the sleepy town that they now call home—though some call it a prison. Instead of facing unearthly monsters and galactic threats, they deal with vengeful exes, misunderstandings, and hungry farm animals. As Abraham Slam wonders if he’s hit his expiration date, a new threat emerges in Rockwood that will keep him on his toes.

NAME: Black Hammer
ISSUE SUMMARY: He was born into the Red Tribes of Mars. He walked the streets of Spiral City as a police officer by day, vigilante hero by night. And now he s trapped in the sleepy-but-sinister Rockwood. In each of these places, Barbalien has been an outsider. He s never felt at home. Maybe, in the end, home is not a location . . . it's something to find in other people.

NAME: Black Hammer
ISSUE SUMMARY: Twenty years ago, Joseph Weber became the Black Hammer. Ten years ago, Lucy Weber lost her father when he defeated Anti-God, saving Spiral City and the world. Two years ago, Lucy started looking for him. And she found more than she ever expected.

NAME: Black Hammer
ISSUE SUMMARY: It was the greatest superhero event of all time, a multiversal crisis. Black Hammer, Abraham Slam, Golden Gail, Barbalien, Colonel Weird, and even Madame Dragonfly they united to take down Anti-God, the ultimate evil, on the streets of Spiral City.

NAME: Black Panther
ISSUE SUMMARY: “THE INTERGALACTIC EMPIRE OF WAKANDA: THE GATHERING OF MY NAME” Part 3 The Panther faces a creature of nightmares! In the fight against N’Jadaka and his empire, the Maroons embark on a journey through myth. But the loss of their leader N’Yami continues to haunt them. And the true monster lies in wait.

NAME: Black Panther
ISSUE SUMMARY: THE DRAMATIC CONCLUSION: EVERYONE DIES! Or at least one person will come very, very close to dying! Probably! It’s hard to tell with these team-up books! But one thing’s for sure: This is the end. And there’s a reason Wade Wilson is known as DEADpool. Will he obtain the Vibranium he needs to save Willie Lumpkin’s life? Will the Black Panther chase immortality to stop him? Will Wade’s teleporter ever work properly? Find out here!

NAME: Captain Marvel
ISSUE SUMMARY: HERO FOR A DAY, HERO FOR A PLANET! It’s CAROL DANVERS Day! Air Force Pilot Carol Danvers is a hero to many…so what could possibly delay her to her own celebration? Only her other job—as Earth’s Mightiest Hero, CAPTAIN MARVEL! Stuck between her duty to her community and her responsibility to the wider world, Carol will have to make a tough decision, and muster all of her power to fend off an invasion force! Don’t miss the excitement of the STRONGEST & MIGHTIEST hero of all in her latest adventure!

NAME: Cellies
ISSUE SUMMARY: Chaos has hit the Jog Mobile store, and its name? Black Friday. Unless Christian wants to relive the midnight launch and the fury of a few hundred nerds, he and the team are gonna need a new plan.

NAME: Civil War II
ISSUE SUMMARY: If you knew something bad was about to happen, would you stop it? How far would you go? The line is drawn. Everyone in the Marvel Universe has to ask themselves: are you with Captain Marvel or Iron Man? Kicking off an all-new series, this first issue features Nick Fury, Damage Control and Night Thrasher!

NAME: Civil War II
ISSUE SUMMARY: A major loss sends shockwaves through the super hero community forcing everyone to reexamine their alliances…did they choose the right side? Featuring Nick Fury, War Machine and Tom Foster, a.k.a. Goliath!

NAME: Civil War II
ISSUE SUMMARY: The trial of the century! Even with the eyes of the Marvel Universe upon them, neither side is backing down...Featuring Nick Fury, The Punisher and Power Pack!

NAME: Civil War II
ISSUE SUMMARY: The battle is heating up, but nothing's hotter than the limelight! When the media starts muckraking, how far will heroes go to stay out of the public eye? Featuring Nick Fury, Kate Bishop, and jolly J. Jonah Jameson himself!

NAME: Civil War II
ISSUE SUMMARY: As the body count rises, no one expected the biggest casualty of them all: Friendship. Will these Avengers betray their closest confidants to stay true to themselves? Featuring Nick Fury, Colleen Wing and Alpha Flight!

ISSUE SUMMARY: As the conflict spreads across the globe, will both sides lay down their arms or keep fighting to the bitter end? Featuring Nick Fury, Jessica Jones and the White Fox!!

NAME: Civil War II
ISSUE SUMMARY: The world is on the brink of chaos, with heroes on all sides of the war...but when only the best are called into action, where will the world's first super hero land? Join us for an all-new epic Civil War II series that takes Hercules right to the front lines! As a God, is he responsible for a larger role in the potential destruction of the Marvel Universe? Or does he have the power to alter fate?

NAME: Civil War II
ISSUE SUMMARY: A new Civil War is ripping through the Marvel Universe, but HERCULES has got problems of his own. There's a threat that only he knows about, and all the heroes he knows are too busy to lend a hand. Time to get out his address book and call in some much older friends…ancient heroes of myth who will come to his aid. Introducing the mighty, mythological GODS OF WAR!

NAME: Civil War II
ISSUE SUMMARY: MEET THE DEITIES READY TO SAVE THE DAY. As a civil war rips through the Marvel Universe, HERCULES battles to stop the Uprising Storm…the one threat no one else is aware of. But if the first super hero is going to save the world, he's going to need help, and not even the Avengers are going to stand in his way. With no one else to turn to, Herc must recruit heroes of myth to stand at his side. HERE COME GILGAMESH, BEOWULF, IRE, THESEUS, SIGURD and LORELEI…the GODS OF WAR!

NAME: Civil War II
ISSUE SUMMARY: With the world locked in Civil War, HERCULES and the GODS OF WAR face down a catastrophic threat that the other heroes of the Marvel Universe are blind to. Can they prevail alone against the wrath of a new race of gods? Or has the Civil War provided the Uprising Storm with the perfect opportunity to master the world and change it forever?

NAME: Civil War II
ISSUE SUMMARY: An Inhuman with the ability to predict the future has helped the heroes of the Marvel Universe clamp down on crime before it can even happen. While this thwarts most criminals, one man has found a way to keep doing what he does best. Wilson Fisk has managed to stay one step ahead of the good guys and his crime enterprise is BOOMING. But what's his secret?! It's a gritty, street-level view of CIVIL WAR II starring the Kingpin in a world without crime!

NAME: Civil War II
ISSUE SUMMARY: Despite the heroes' new future-seeing ally, the crime business is treating Wilson Fisk VERY well. So well, in fact, that his jealous competitors are MURDERING the Kingpin's men. And to make matters worse, the linchpin of Fisk's operation — an inhuman with the uncanny ability to stay incognito — is getting ill. Can the Kingpin find a way to keep his business afloat or is his time on top finally finished?

NAME: Civil War II
ISSUE SUMMARY: Wilson Fisk has reason to believe that one of his own men is staging a coup—and killing those who won't surrender their loyalty. But mutiny becomes the least of Fisk's worries when the Punisher launches an attack on the Kingpin's safe house. Can the Fisk keep his business afloat with his cronies dropping like flies, and Frank Castle gunning for him, or is this finally the end of the reign of the KINGPIN?

NAME: Civil War II
ISSUE SUMMARY: He may be a criminal, but Wilson Fisk is a self-made man. He's worked hard to secure his empire. He built it from the ground up. And now that Fisk knows one of his men has betrayed him in an attempt to take away his life's work, he's prepared to give his all to put an end to the mutiny. After all, you don't become the KINGPIN of crime without breaking a few rules and a lot of blood, sweat and tears…

NAME: Civil War II
ISSUE SUMMARY: A Civil War II Prequel! How did Ulysses join the Inhumans? What difficult journey did he have to go through to master his powers?

NAME: Civil War II
ISSUE SUMMARY: A Civil War II prequel! How did Ulysses join the Inhumans? What difficult journey did he have to go through to master his powers?

NAME: Civil War II
ISSUE SUMMARY: Committed to comprehending his Inhuman ability to see the future, Ulysses begins training within Karnak's Tower—but has he made the right choice? Struck with a grisly vision, Ulysses must again come to terms with the magnitude of his power... and the limitations!

NAME: Civil War II
ISSUE SUMMARY: After a vision of the death of innocent people, Ulysses is desperate to leave Karnak's training in the Tower and prevent a horrific vision from becoming reality! So why won't Karnak let him leave?

NAME: Civil War II
ISSUE SUMMARY: Totally isolated from the human world, Ulysses must escape Karnak's captivity to prevent the deaths of hundreds of people...but being in the Inhuman world will make Ulysses' breakout considerably more complicated, as he faces the grim Inhuman inhabitants of the Tower!

NAME: Civil War II
ISSUE SUMMARY: Ulysses confronts Karnak and discovers the outcome of his horrible vision!

NAME: Civil War II
ISSUE SUMMARY: Terrigen Mists circle the globe, igniting the Inhuman race while crippling mutantkind, pitting the two nations against one another. But when a new Inhuman with the ability to profile the future emerges, the X-Men fear that he may tip the scales in the Inhumans' favor, spelling doom for their kind. And one mutant is willing to wage war with the Inhumans AND his own people to prevent that from coming to pass. The X-Men enter the fray of CIVIL WAR II when the world's most terrifying mutant, Magneto, takes mutantkind's fate into his own hands!

NAME: Civil War II
ISSUE SUMMARY: An Inhuman with the power to profile the future has emerged, upsetting the delicate balance of power between the Inhuman and Mutant nations. And the mutant master of magnetism, MAGNETO refuses to allow his people to fall by the wayside. Now, Magneto rallies those who would follow him to even the scales…even if it means risking war with Inhumans and Mutants alike to do it!

NAME: Civil War II
ISSUE SUMMARY: An Inhuman with the ability to profile the future has emerged, upsetting the delicate balance of power between the Inhuman and Mutant nations. Refusing to let his people fall by the wayside, the mutant master of magnetism, MAGNETO, gathers those who sympathize with his cause to aid him in his crusade: an assault on Attilan to take the new Inhuman off the board!

NAME: Civil War II
ISSUE SUMMARY: When a new Inhuman manifests the ability to profile the future, threatening to tip the scales of the Mutant/Inhuman conflict out of his favor, MAGNETO takes decisive action to safeguard the future of his people. But will his actions only make the future he fears most a reality?

NAME: Civil War II
ISSUE SUMMARY: The Amazing Spider-Man gets caught up in Civil War II! There's a new Inhuman with the ability to seemingly predict the future, and as the heroes of the Marvel Universe continue to grapple with their feelings about his very existence one thing almost everyone can agree on is that he bears a tremendous responsibility to use his powers safely. Peter Parker, aka THE AMAZING SPIDER-MAN, knows a thing or two about that- too bad he's also got the ol' Parker luck working against him.

NAME: Civil War II
ISSUE SUMMARY: Ulysses made a shocking prediction that someone in Spider-Man's life would turn traitor… and it isn't who you'd expect! The folks at Parker Industries already had one mole in their midst, another could destroy everything Peter's worked to build! Good thing Peter's got his old pal, Harry Osborn by his side, right? …Right?

NAME: Civil War II
ISSUE SUMMARY: Ulysses' visions wreak havoc on Spider-Man. The Amazing Spider-Man and Clash fight a swarm of robots and Clash slide into old habits!

NAME: Civil War II
ISSUE SUMMARY: The effects of Ulysses' prediction are felt as CLASH ATTACKS SPIDER-MAN!

NAME: Civil War II
ISSUE SUMMARY: CIVIL WAR II TIE-IN! Civil War has come to A-FORCE! As the team is wrecked by a personal tragedy things only get worse when a predictive vision proclaims one of A-FORCE is a murderer. CAPTAIN MARVEL attempts an arrest, creating a rift that may very well mean the end of the team, and setting in motion a chain of devastating events that affect far more than just A-FORCE. Meanwhile foul-mouthed, gun-toting ELSA BLOODSTONE just unofficially joined A-Force. Looks like we're gonna need a bigger boat...and a verrrrry big black censor bar.

NAME: Civil War II
ISSUE SUMMARY: The fates of NICO MINORU, a mysterious missing girl named Alice, and a small town in Colorado are all tied together as CIVIL WAR II heats up and threatens to tear A-FORCE apart. The team, with ELSA BLOODSTONE in foul-mouthed tow, splits up to hunt down the apparent source of the trouble in the hopes of saving the town. However, it soon becomes apparent that all is not what it seems with the team—A-Force is changing—and by morning there may not be anyone left to save the day.

NAME: Civil War II
ISSUE SUMMARY: The lives of A-FORCE, a mysterious woman named Alice and an entire town lie in the hands of NICO MINORU. What Nico chooses to do next can save the day but can also make her a murderer — the very thing she's been running from since CAPTAIN MARVEL first tried to arrest her. And if A-Force manages to survive the day, can the team stay together? Or will this be the end of A-Force as we know it?

NAME: Civil War II
ISSUE SUMMARY: The AGENTS OF S.H.I.E.L.D. are thrust into the middle of a war between heroes, and nothing will ever be the same for S.H.I.E.L.D. itself and for our beloved team as this mission will have lasting ramifications for Coulson and his intrepid agents.

NAME: Civil War II
ISSUE SUMMARY: CIVIL WAR II TIE-IN! PHIL COULSON, agent of S.H.I.E.L.D. no more! Coulson has chosen a side in this war...HIS OWN! The THIRD FACTION begins here. You are not going to want to miss this seismic-change issue.

NAME: Civil War II
ISSUE SUMMARY: IT'S COULSON VERSUS HIS TEAMMATES IN THIS EPIC SHOWDOWN! PHIL COULSON's THIRD FACTION is hitting the battlefield of CIVIL WAR II! But how will they fare against Coulson's former teammates and their new leader, ELEKTRA?? Sides are being chosen and these AGENTS OF S.H.I.E.L.D. will never be the same.

NAME: Civil War II
ISSUE SUMMARY: The S.H.I.E.L.D. Civil War Concludes! Will COULSON return to his team? Will JEMMA SIMMONS live? Who is the new DEATHLOK? Get your answers here!

NAME: Civil War II
ISSUE SUMMARY: CIVIL WAR II TIE-IN! Which side will WOLVERINE choose when a terrible prophecy puts someone she loves into the crosshairs of her allies? How far is LAURA willing to go to protect her loved ones? Teaming up with OLD MAN LOGAN, Laura is prepared to fight the very future itself to change her destiny.

NAME: Civil War II
ISSUE SUMMARY: CIVIL WAR II TIE-IN! DESTINY COMES KNOCKING FOR WOLVERINE! LAURA KINNEY has fought all her life to avoid a destiny she did not want. She has fought against instincts that would make her nothing more than a weapon to be used by others, instead becoming a hero — becoming WOLVERINE. But now, destiny intrudes again, this time threatening those dearest to her. And with a SUPER HERO CIVIL WAR tearing her world apart, is there any hope that Wolverine will emerge victorious? Or will she finally succumb to destiny?

NAME: Civil War II
ISSUE SUMMARY: THE ASTONISHING CONCLUSION TO OUR CIVIL WAR II TIE IN! GABBY's life hangs in the balance, with her death having been predicted to be cut short by none other than OLD MAN LOGAN. As the shocking prediction looks to be coming true, LAURA's world is torn apart. Old Man Logan might be too old to stand against the fury of the ALL-NEW WOLVERINE.

NAME: Civil War II
ISSUE SUMMARY: CIVIL WAR II TIE-IN! Convinced that he has chosen the right side in the war, the Vision undertakes a manhunt through time in order to stop one of Earth's greatest evils!

NAME: Civil War II
ISSUE SUMMARY: Spotlight on the All-New Wasp as she finds her loyalties torn by the war—and seeks guidance in the most unexpected place.

NAME: Civil War II
ISSUE SUMMARY: CIVIL WAR II TIE-IN! In her short time wielding the hammer Mjolnir, Thor has witnessed cosmic chaos — but how does her human half process the consequences of the Iron Man/Captain Marvel struggle and what it does to the Avengers?

NAME: Civil War II
ISSUE SUMMARY: Civil War II tie-in! In a time of crisis, Sam is called upon to honor a fallen hero- and speak to a divided nation. But is anyone listening?

NAME: Civil War II
ISSUE SUMMARY: CIVIL WAR II TIE-IN! With the battle lines forming, Sam must choose a side.

NAME: Civil War II
ISSUE SUMMARY: CIVIL WAR II TIE-IN! Who are The Americops? #givebacktheshield is trending.

NAME: Civil War II
ISSUE SUMMARY: Captain America vs. U.S.Agent! No more waiting: #takebacktheshield

NAME: Civil War II
ISSUE SUMMARY: CIVIL WAR II TIE-IN! With war on the horizon, Steve attempts to broker a truce between Iron Man and Captain Marvel.

NAME: Civil War II
ISSUE SUMMARY: CIVIL WAR II TIE-IN! As heroes choose sides and tragedy strikes, Steve takes steps to end the war. Guest-starring the Invincible Iron Man!

NAME: Civil War II
ISSUE SUMMARY: CIVIL WAR II TIE-IN! With the Marvel Universe at war, Steve fights for peace. Guest-starring Captain Marvel!

NAME: Civil War II
ISSUE SUMMARY: Civil War II tie-in! Old friends face off as enemies in an event that will change Captain Marvel's life forever. As war erupts, Carol finds herself at the forefront of battle. But after tragedy hits too close to home, how far will Carol go to fight for what she believes in? This is Captain Marvel at her finest. In her toughest fight yet.
WRITER(S):
Christos N. Gage
Ruth Fletcher Gage

NAME: Civil War II
ISSUE SUMMARY: CIVIL WAR II TIE-IN! Captain Marvel's determination reaches new heights as her rift with Iron Man gets deeper. It's a fight for the future as Carol and the Alpha Flight recruit more to their cause. But will forces outside of Captain Marvel destroy everything she's trying to protect?
WRITER(S):
Christos N. Gage
Ruth Fletcher Gage

NAME: Civil War II
ISSUE SUMMARY: CIVIL WAR II TIE-IN! No time for second-guessing, Captain Marvel is determined to change the future to protect the present. With wins on her side, Carol knows her mission is the right thing to do, but does everyone else? It's a Civil War II story that will change everything for Captain Marvel.
WRITER(S):
Christos N. Gage
Ruth Fletcher Gage

NAME: Civil War II
ISSUE SUMMARY: CIVIL WAR II TIE-IN! Captain Marvel thought she had it figured out—change the future and save lives. But as friendships turn cold, she has to decide how far she's willing to go…
WRITER(S):
Christos N. Gage
Ruth Fletcher Gage

NAME: Civil War II
ISSUE SUMMARY: CIVIL WAR II TIE-IN! The final showdown between Carol and Tony's forces. Fist meets metal in the ultimate battle for the future!
